service.sql:
select convert(varchar(200), jswbod.company_name) cn, sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) wbgpa2, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price * win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount), 0) wbssp4, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa5, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price * win_bid_ele_copper_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount), 0) wbiop8, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbioa9, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price * win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount), 0) wwbrsp10, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbrsa11, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price * win_bid_cardboard_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount), 0) wbcp12, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca13, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price * win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount), 0) wbcp14, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbca15, sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) womc16, sum(win_bid_material_total) wbmt17
from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS jswbod,JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_VIEW jsoed where jswbod.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.code = jswbod.code and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dEnd.date}) >= 0 group by jswbod.company_name

select '合计', sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) wbgpa2, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price * win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount), 0) wbssp4, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa5, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price * win_bid_ele_copper_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount), 0) wbiop8, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbioa9, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price * win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount), 0) wwbrsp10, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbrsa11, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price * win_bid_cardboard_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount), 0) wbcp12, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca13, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price * win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount), 0) wbcp14, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbca15, sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) womc16, sum(win_bid_material_total) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS jswbod,JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_VIEW jsoed where jswbod.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.code = jswbod.code and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dEnd.date}) >= 0

select convert(varchar(200), jsoed.company_name) cn, sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) ogpa2, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(op_unit_price_of_silicon_steel * op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) / nullif(sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel), 0) wbssp4, sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(op_copper_price * op_amount_of_copper) / nullif(sum(op_amount_of_copper), 0) wbiop8, sum(op_amount_of_copper) wbioa9, sum(op_unit_price_of_transformer_oil * op_transformer_oil_consumption) / nullif(sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption), 0) wwbrsp10, sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(op_cardboard_unit_price * op_amount_of_cardboard) / nullif(sum(op_amount_of_cardboard), 0) wbcp12, sum(op_amount_of_cardboard) wbca13, sum(op_steel_price * op_steel_dosage) / nullif(sum(op_steel_dosage), 0) wbcp14, sum(op_steel_dosage) wbca15, sum(op_other_materials) womc16, sum(op_total_tax_material) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_VIEW jsoed,JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS jswbod where jswbod.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.code = jswbod.code and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dEnd.date}) >= 0 group by jsoed.company_name

select '合计', sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) ogpa2, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(jsoed.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(op_unit_price_of_silicon_steel * op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) / nullif(sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel), 0) wbssp4, sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(op_copper_price * op_amount_of_copper) / nullif(sum(op_amount_of_copper), 0) wbiop8, sum(op_amount_of_copper) wbioa9, sum(op_unit_price_of_transformer_oil * op_transformer_oil_consumption) / nullif(sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption), 0) wwbrsp10, sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(op_cardboard_unit_price * op_amount_of_cardboard) / nullif(sum(op_amount_of_cardboard), 0) wbcp12, sum(op_amount_of_cardboard) wbca13, sum(op_steel_price * op_steel_dosage) / nullif(sum(op_steel_dosage), 0) wbcp14, sum(op_steel_dosage) wbca15, sum(op_other_materials) womc16, sum(op_total_tax_material) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_VIEW jsoed,JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS jswbod where jswbod.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.company_name in ${dwmcs} and jsoed.code = jswbod.code and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, execution_month - 1, dateadd(yy, execution_year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dEnd.date}) >= 0

controller.list: 交货时间,合同金额,项目阶段,毛利额,毛利率,硅钢,硅钢,电解铜,电解铜,变压器油,变压器油,纸板,纸板,钢材,钢材,其他材料成本,材料成本总计
交货时间,合同金额,项目阶段,毛利额,毛利率,单价,用量,单价,用量,单价,用量,,单价,用量,单价,用量,其他材料成本,材料成本总计

response.name: 执行阶段订单成本汇总表.xls

map.value: 执行阶段订单成本汇总表
